headline: NRG Energy, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, April 08, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend on the Company’s common stock of $0.44 per share, or $1.76 per share on an annualized basis. The dividend is payable on May 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of May 1, 2025.

headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Stock Moves -1.54%: What You Should Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, NRG Energy (NRG) stood at $85.90, denoting a -1.54% change from the preceding trading day.
